attributes.additional_details:
Following Sepp Blatters latest statement, it is now we must all make a stand and finally rid this man from the head of football.
He condoned gay supporters going to Qatar, he stated that women footballers should wear skimpier clothing and now he states their is no racism in football.
It is time to make a stand.
Lets kick Blatter out of Football

rejection.details: The FIFA leadership is a matter for FIFA. However, the Prime Minister and the Sports Minister have both made statements on this issue.
